issue.title: [Python] Enable ParquetFile to pass down separately-obtained file metadata
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-471](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-471). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As part of the procedure for reading a directory of files, we will only want to read a file's metadata once.
